General.Name: Linux Gold Corp
General.Description: 0187279 B.C. Ltd. does not have significant operations. The company focuses on identifying and evaluating suitable assets or businesses to acquire or merge with and pursuing a corporate transaction. Previously, it was engaged in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties. The company was formerly known as Linux Gold Corp. and changed its name to 0187279 B.C. Ltd. in February 2022. The company was incorporated in 1979 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: #240 -11780 Hammersmith Way, Richmond, BC, Canada, V7A 5E9
